name: Choplifter 1985 - Remake by Lyuboslav Nemtsov
description:
Choplifter 1985 reprogrammed by SEGA.

Originally created by Dan Gorlin in 1982.

 You control a helicopter which must bust open enemy bases, rescue your people trapped inside, and bring them back alive.

I had 7 weeks to recreate this Arcade title in Unreal Engine. I used 2 weeks to research and play the game and 5 weeks to learn unreal and try to recreate the mechanics & systems, the art and the feel of the game faithfully. 

Controller is required for best experience!
